timeline.body: This is not sane - this will pass 5%3, and will then throw an exception because it can't parse the number.... which is then sent back to the user as 'NotEnoughArgumentsException'.

timeline.body: Forgot, there should also be a space between the `if` and `(` here. By the way, using CTRL+ALT+L in IntelliJ will auto format the file for you, in standard formatting (which is what is used here).

timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.body:
This can be optimized quite a bit.
```suggestion
            amount = player.getMoney().multiply(amount).scaleByPowerOfTen(-2);
```

This abuses how BigDecimals & Integers work to get around a division.
timeline.bodyHTML:
This can be optimized quite a bit.

Suggested change
amount = player.getMoney().multiply(amount.divide(new BigDecimal("100.0")));
amount = player.getMoney().multiply(amount).scaleByPowerOfTen(-2);

This abuses how BigDecimals & Integers work to get around a division.
timeline.author: Ichbinjoe

timeline.message: Fixed spacing around isPercent, removed unnecessary parenthesis, optimized conversion
